subject: feat: add debug error banner and force fresh JS/CSS on refresh
body:
Debug banner captures all JS errors (window.onerror, unhandled
rejections, React ErrorBoundary) in a fixed red banner with copy
button for easy bug reporting. Works even if React crashes.

PWA now auto-activates new service workers (skipWaiting +
clientsClaim) with controllerchange reload, so pull-to-refresh
gets fresh JS/CSS when a new build is deployed.
